content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment to be a great living space. How much are you looking to spend on rent per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I'm currently a student, and I'm looking for a place that's both affordable and comfortable. I would like to spend around 700 Euros per month, including all utilities. Is that something that could work for this apartment?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam, considering the location and the quality of the apartment, 700 Euros per month is quite low. However, I'm willing to negotiate. Can you increase your offer slightly?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that the location and quality of the apartment are exceptional. I'm flexible with my budget and willing to increase my offer slightly. How about 750 Euros per month, including all utilities? Would that be more acceptable?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam, your offer of 750 Euros per month is more in line with what I had in mind. However, I believe this apartment could fetch a higher price due to its prime location and modern amenities. Would you be willing to go up to 800 Euros per month? That would be a fair price for both parties.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your expertise in real estate is evident. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While 800 Euros per month is quite fair, I must consider my budget as a student. Could we possibly meet in the middle? How about 775 Euros per month? I believe that's a fair compromise.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam, you're a shrewd negotiator. 775 Euros per month is indeed a fair compromise. I am willing to accept your offer under one condition: you must sign a two-year lease. This will provide me with some stability as a landlord. Would you agree to these terms?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm very pleased with the outcome of our negotiation. Your condition of a two-year lease is reasonable, and I'm ready to commit to it. I agree to the price of 775 Euros per month, including all utilities, and I will sign a two-year lease. TERMINATE
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
